mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterStudentClassMappingInfo */ INTO FRST.STD_CLS_MAP ( CLS_INFO_ID , STD_ID , SCR_ID , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{classInfoID} , #{studentID} , COALESCE(#{scoreID}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
